snippet: June’s trade numbers came in much weaker than expected on Wednesday, offering up the latest evidence that the Chinese economy has lost much of its previous vigor.
abstract: Chinese trade data for June comes in much weaker than expected, offering up the latest evidence that the Chinese economy has lost much of its previous vigor; exports fall 3.1 percent from year earlier and imports drop 0.7 percent.
lead_paragraph: June’s trade numbers came in much weaker than expected on Wednesday, offering up the latest evidence that the Chinese economy has lost much of its previous vigor.

headline.main: China’s Trade Data Is Significantly Weaker Than Forecast
headline.print_headline: China’s Trade Data Is Significantly Weaker Than Forecast
